data.tempName: Summit Bay Jury Duty Excuse Letter
data.template:
REQUEST TO EXCUSE FROM JURY DUTY FOR MEDICAL REASONS


Juror/Patient Name: ___________________________  Juror Number:_________________


Scheduled Jury Duty Date: ______________________________________________________


I attest that the above named Juror/Patient has been a patient of Summit Bay Health Center since:  ____________________________


I attest that the above named Juror/Patient has a medical condition that prevents serving on a jury at this time and that this medical condition makes it inadvisable to serve:


______ Temporarily, with an anticipated clearance to serve after (date) ____________


______ Temporarily, with an unknown resolution date of condition.


______ Permanently, due to the following medical condition(s):

REQUEST TO EXCUSE FROM WORK/SCHOOL


Patient Name:


Chart #:


Patient was seen in the office on: <date>


______ Please excuse this patient from work/school from

________________  to  ______________.


______ Patient may return to work/school on ________________.


______ Patient may return to work/school on ________________ 

with the following restrictions:

__________________________________________________

__________________________________________________

__________________________________________________

__________________________________________________


______ Other _____________________________________________

__________________________________________________

__________________________________________________

<Date>

Patient:

Chart Number:

Dear <insert patient name>

We had you scheduled for an appointment today at _______________ with Dr. __________________.   Please call our office as soon as possible to reschedule.


Sincerely,


< Name>
